    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    getBotType()
    getter for type of bot
    void
    move()
    void method to traverse the bot through the map, creates a queue with the calculated steps to reach the enemy flag, after that sets the vertex previously occupied by the bot has not occupied ( false ) and the current index where the bot stands as occupied ( true ).

  • Constructor Details

    • LeBotJames

      public LeBotJames(Players owner, int currentPosition, Map gamemap, int endlocation, int startPosition)
      Constructor for LeBotJames bot, this bot traverses the map completely at random.
      Parameters:
      owner - owner of this bot
      currentPosition - current location in the map of the bot
      gamemap - map where the game is played
      endlocation - location of the enemy flag
      startPosition - location of ally flag

  • Method Details

    • move

      public void move()
      void method to traverse the bot through the map, creates a queue with the calculated steps to reach the enemy flag, after that sets the vertex previously occupied by the bot has not occupied ( false ) and the current index where the bot stands as occupied ( true ).
      Specified by:
      move in class BigBot
